exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ShadeSkin" width="400" height="300" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"  states="score,target,level,source"  width.score="300" height.score="50" width.target="600" height.target="120" width.level="100" height.level="50" width.source="160" height.source="160" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="15fd8793fc2"/>
	<e:Rect height="20" fillColor="0xffffff" width.score="300" height.score="50" ellipseWidth.score="20" ellipseHeight.score="20" fillColor.score="0x000000" fillAlpha.score="0.3" strokeColor.score="0xffffff" strokeWeight.score="2" height.target="120" ellipseWidth.target="40" ellipseHeight.target="40" fillColor.target="0x000000" fillAlpha.target="0.3" strokeColor.target="0xffffff" strokeWeight.target="3" left.target="0" top.target="0" left.score="0" top.score="0" strokeAlpha.score="0.8" strokeAlpha.target="0.8" width.level="100" height.level="50" ellipseWidth.level="20" ellipseHeight.level="20" fillColor.level="0x000000" fillAlpha.level="0.3" strokeColor.level="0xffffff" strokeWeight.level="2" left.level="0" top.level="0" strokeAlpha.level="0.8" width.source="160" height.source="160" ellipseWidth.source="160" ellipseHeight.source="160" fillColor.source="0x000000" fillAlpha.source="0.5" strokeWeight.source="5" left.source="0" top.source="0" strokeAlpha.source="0.5" strokeColor.source="0xd8ab13" width.target="600"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay"
             size="30"
             verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true" textColor="0xe23a00" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" height="70%" width="80%"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BaseSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:Cube="Cube.*" >
	<w:Config id="15fcc88d4ff" ></w:Config>
	<e:Group width="100%" height="100%" left="0" top="0">
		<e:Image id="bg" width="100%" height="100%" left="0" top="0" source="bg_jpg"/>
		<e:Image width="550" height="180" right="0" top="0" source="guang_png"/>
		<e:Image width="217" height="76" x="51" y="45" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="cloud_0_png"/>
		<e:Image width="266" height="133" x="368" y="110" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="cloud_2_png"/>
		<e:Image width="140" height="140" horizontalCenter="-190" bottom="40" source="01_png"/>
		<e:Image width="140" height="140" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="40" source="01_png"/>
		<e:Image width="140" height="140" horizontalCenter="190" bottom="40" source="01_png"/>
		<e:Group width="100" height="50" left="20" top="45">
			<e:Rect id="levelr" width="100" height="50" currentState="level" enabled="false" skinName="ShadeSkin" fillAlpha="0" strokeAlpha="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			<e:BitmapLabel id="level" width="232" height="70" font="cube_font_fnt" text="1" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="0.43" scaleY="0.43" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:BitmapLabel width="260" height="60" font="cube_font_fnt" text="LEVEL" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="0.43" scaleY="0.43" left="20" top="20"/>
		<e:Rect id="scorer" width="300" height="50" top="45" currentState="score" enabled="false" skinName="ShadeSkin" fillAlpha="0" strokeAlpha="0" right="20"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel width="279" height="60" font="cube_font_fnt" text="SCORE" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="0.43" scaleY="0.43" top="20" right="200"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="score" width="651" height="70" font="cube_font_fnt" text="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="0.43" scaleY="0.43" top="55" right="30" textAlign="right"/>
		<e:Rect id="targetr" height="120" currentState="target" enabled="false" skinName="ShadeSkin" fillAlpha="0" strokeAlpha="0" top="150" width="600" right="20"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel width="400" height="60" font="cube_font_fnt" text="TARGET" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="0.71" top="110" scaleY="0.71" right="336"/>
		<e:Group id="target1" width="100" height="100" top="160" right="480">
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="target2" width="100" height="100" top="160" right="340"/>
		<e:Group id="target3" width="100" height="100" top="160" right="200"/>
		<e:Group id="target4" width="100" height="100" top="160" right="60">
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="base" height="634" width="634" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="40">
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="source1" width="160" height="160" horizontalCenter="-190" bottom="30">
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="source2" width="160" height="160" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="30"/>
		<e:Group id="source3" width="160" height="160" horizontalCenter="190" bottom="30">
		</e:Group>
		<e:Rect id="top_shade" left="0" top="0" right="0" bottom="0" alpha="0" fillColor="0x000000"/>
		<e:Group id="top_group" width="520" height="1020" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:Rect id="top_bg" width="100%" height="100%" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" ellipseWidth="20" ellipseHeight="20" fillColor="0xf2c468" alpha="0" left="0" top="0"/>
			<e:Label id="top_head" text="排行榜" fontFamily="DFKai-SB" textColor="0xe23a00" bold="true" size="50" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-450" alpha="0"/>
			<e:List id="top_list" width="460" height="700" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-50" itemRendererSkinName="scoreSkin" alpha="0"/>
			<e:Label id="top_msg" text="" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="360" height="60" size="30" width="460" textAlign="center" textColor="0x210e00" bold="true" alpha="0"/>
			<e:Button id="top_button" label="" width="150" height="50" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="450" alpha="0" skinName="skins.ButtonSkin"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin_S" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay"
             size="20"
             verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true" textColor="0xe23a00" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" height="80%" width="90%"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ResCubeSkin" width="66" height="66" currentState="yellow" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  states="base,red,blue,green,yellow,empty,match" >
	<w:Config id="15fcca69b43" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" strokeWeight="1.5" fillAlpha="0.95" ellipseWidth="15" ellipseHeight="15" strokeAlpha="0.8" fillColor="0xb4b4b4" fillColor.red="0xc82850" fillColor.blue="0x2850c8" fillColor.green="0x63b252" fillColor.yellow="0xccbb45" fillColor.empty="0x000000" ellipseWidth.empty="20" ellipseHeight.empty="20" width.red="100%" height.red="100%" width.base="100%" height.base="100%" width.match="100%" height.match="100%" fillAlpha.match="0" strokeWeight.match="5" strokeColor.match="0xffffff"/>
	<e:Image includeIn="empty" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0" source="03_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay"
	                textColor="0x210e00" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="100%" size="30"  textAlign="center" bold="true" top="0" left="0"/>
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay"
	                width="100%" height="100%" size="30" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" textAlign="center" textColor="0x210e00" alpha="0.8" top="0" left="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="recordSkin" width="460" height="70" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="border" width="100%" height="100%" fillAlpha="0" left="0" strokeWeight="3" strokeAlpha="0.9" ellipseWidth="15" ellipseHeight="15" top="0" strokeColor="0xdd0808"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="rank" width="227" height="70" font="cube_font_fnt" textAlign="center" left="0" scaleX="0.33" scaleY="0.43" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalCenter="-15"/>
	<e:TextInput id="nick" width="150" height="30" left="75" anchorOffsetX="0" textColor="0x210e00" verticalCenter="-15" prompt="昵称"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="level" width="242" height="70" font="cube_font_fnt" textAlign="center" left="225" scaleX="0.33" scaleY="0.43" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalCenter="-15"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="score" width="470" height="70" font="cube_font_fnt" textAlign="center" left="305" scaleX="0.33" scaleY="0.43" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalCenter="-15"/>
	<e:TextInput id="desc" width="410" height="30" left="0" anchorOffsetX="0" textColor="0x210e00" verticalCenter="15" prompt="留言"/>
	<e:Button id="submit" label="提交" height="30" right="3" bottom="3" anchorOffsetX="0" width="50" skinName="skins.ButtonSkin_S"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="scoreSkin" width="460" height="70" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="border" width="100%" height="100%" fillAlpha="0" strokeColor="0xe07708" left="0" strokeWeight="3" strokeAlpha="1" ellipseWidth="15" ellipseHeight="15" top="0"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="rank" width="227" height="70" font="cube_font_fnt" text="{data.rank}" textAlign="center" left="0" scaleX="0.33" scaleY="0.43" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalCenter="-15"/>
	<e:Label id="name" text="{data.name}" width="150" height="30" left="75" textAlign="center" anchorOffsetX="0" size="30" bold="true" textColor="0x210e00" verticalCenter="-15"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="level" width="242" height="70" font="cube_font_fnt" text="{data.level}" textAlign="center" left="225" scaleX="0.33" scaleY="0.43" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalCenter="-15"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="score" width="470" height="70" font="cube_font_fnt" text="{data.score}" textAlign="center" left="305" scaleX="0.33" scaleY="0.43" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalCenter="-15"/>
	<e:Label id="desc" text="{data.desc}" width="460" height="30" left="0" textAlign="center" anchorOffsetX="0" size="30" bold="true" verticalCenter="15" textColor="0x210e00"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="scoreheadSkin" width="460" height="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="head" >
	<e:BitmapLabel id="rank" width="227" height="70" font="cube_font_fnt" text="RANK" textAlign="center" left="0" scaleX="0.33" scaleY="0.43" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel width="455" height="70" font="cube_font_fnt" text="NAME" textAlign="center" scaleX="0.33" scaleY="0.43" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" includeIn="head" left="75" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="level" width="242" height="70" font="cube_font_fnt" text="LEVEL" textAlign="center" left="225" scaleX="0.33" scaleY="0.43" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalCenter="0" left.head="225" verticalCenter.head="0"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="score" width="470" height="70" font="cube_font_fnt" text="SCORE" textAlign="center" left="305" scaleX="0.33" scaleY="0.43" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalCenter="0" left.head="305" verticalCenter.head="0"/>
</e:Skin>
